name: verifySignedJWT
description: Verify a signed JWT (JSON Web Signature - JWS)

params.name: signOptions
params.description: The signature uses the key information from the given struct

params.name: config
params.description:
A struct with the following values:
- clockSkew : time in seconds to account for difference between the systems generating and processing the JWT
- returntype : plaintext/struct

links.title: JSON Web Tokens in ColdFusion
links.description: Overview of JSON Web Tokens (JWT), including how to use them in ColdFusion
